title: "CMC Vellore, IIT-M sign MoU on artificial intelligence in healthcare"
excerpt: "The Christian Medical College Hospital (CMC) Vellore has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Indian Institute of Technology Madras (IIT Madras) to conduct joint exploratory work in the domain of artificial intelligence (AI) in healthcare."
